q1.question: Can anyone install a security system?
q1.answer: No. Security systems can only be installed by specialized companies, based on a license issued by the General Inspectorate of the Romanian Police, with prior approval from the Romanian Intelligence Service.

q2.question: Alarm system or video surveillance system?
q2.answer: Each system has its advantages and disadvantages. Video surveillance records events, while alarm systems warn and alert in case of unauthorized entry. The two systems complement each other.

q3.question: Do I need police approval for installed systems?
q3.answer: Yes. You will receive the installation project, user instructions, system warranty, invoice and installer code.

q4.question: Is it important to maintain security systems?
q4.answer: Yes. To benefit fully from system protection, it is recommended and sometimes mandatory to have them maintained and periodically checked by qualified personnel.
